titleStmt.title: The Antichristian Presbyter: or, Antichrist transformed; Assuming the nevv shape of a Reformed Presbyter, as his last and subtlest disguise to deceive the nations. / By Richard Laurence, Marshal-Generall.
titleStmt.author: Lawrence, Richard, d. 1684.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the timly information of the people,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "Jan: 9th 1646"; the 7 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
